Posts.Content: hi I've finished chemo and radiotherapy and my hair is very slowly growing back, it's coming back with a lot of grey in it, I know I can't chemically dye it and there is not enough hair anyway but wondered if anyone can recommend a natural dye or colouring shampoo I can use to cover the grey  thanks
Posts.Title: Colouring hair post chemo

Posts.Content: Hi laura I am 55 and diagnosed with grade 2 invasive lobular cancer, had a lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy at end of January, I went in on the morning of the operation and was out by lunchtime, pain was mininal and I had full range of movement nearly straight away, I them had my results 9 days later, unfortunately my seminal node was positive so I am having chemotherapy FEC T which isn't fun but i feel a lot better than I thought I would  good luck to you and your family, have a great holiday, I went away with my husband for a week before chemo and had the best time  Angie xx
